trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a specified timeout has expired.
The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException> class can specify a message to describe the source of the exception.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException> clase puede especificar un mensaje para describir el origen de la excepción.

trans-unit.source: When a method throws this exception, the message is usually "The timeout provided has expired and the operation has not been completed."
trans-unit.target: Cuando un método produce esta excepción, el mensaje suele ser "el tiempo de espera proporcionado ha expirado y no se ha completado la operación."

trans-unit.source: This class is used, for example, by the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class's <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.WaitForStatus%2A> member.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase se utiliza, por ejemplo, mediante la <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> la clase <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.WaitForStatus%2A> miembro.

trans-unit.source: The operation that can throw the exception is a change of the service's <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Status%2A> property (for example, from `Paused` to `ContinuePending`).
trans-unit.target: La operación que pueda producir la excepción es un cambio del servicio <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Status%2A> propiedad (por ejemplo, de `Paused` a `ContinuePending`).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException" /> class with no message text.
Text that describes the type or source of the exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException" /> class with the specified message text.
The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
Initializes a new instace of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException" /> class with the specified serialization information and context.
The class name is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="P:System.Exception.HResult" /> is zero (0).
Text that describes the type or source of the exception.
The exception that caused the current exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException" /> class with the specified message text and inner exception.
